## Checklist

- Purpose
  - [ ] Bug fix
  - [ ] New functionality
  - [ ] Documentation
  - [ ] Refactoring
  - [ ] CI

- Test
  - [ ] Unit test
  - [ ] E2E Test
  - [ ] Tested manually

- Logging
  - [ ] Verified no collision with existing log fields (type consistency)

- Breaking Changes
  - [ ] Yes (description required)
  - [ ] No
